definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: In 1272, Dadu officially became the capital of the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在1272年，正式成爲大渡河首都元代。

sentences.english: "Vocal Music Theory"is the first system theoretical monographs of vocal art in Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《唱論》是我國元代一部聲樂演唱理論專著。

sentences.english: A collection of Mongolian epitaphs of Yuan dynasty translated into Mandarin Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 書中所集之碑文均爲譯自元代蒙古語的公牘。

sentences.english: The whole building is unique in sculpt and delicacy in carving skill, having strong feeling of Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 整座建築造型別致，雕工精巧，具有濃郁的元代風格。

sentences.english: The most outstanding characteristic of Fu works in Yuan Dynasty is "absorbing the essence from the Sao and Han Fu".

sentences.english: Three, Yuan Korea Tributary cycle research.
The Yuan Dynasty established its capital in Dadu, now Beijing.

sentences.english: The result shows that is An efficient optimizing method.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，這是一個有效的單元代化方法。

sentences.english: Bureaucracy can be seen to reflect the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 可見是反映元代的官制。

sentences.english: Guan Hanqing is one of the great dramatists in our country in the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 關漢卿是中國元代著名的雜劇作家之一。

sentences.english: Qin Jianfu was a famous playwright in the late Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 秦簡夫是活躍於元代後期劇壇上的知名作家。

sentences.english: The Yuan Dynasty okho Spring bottles there has changed.
sentences.chinese: 而元代的玉壺春瓶卻有了變化。

sentences.english: There had been complicated conflicts between "Jingshu" and literature in the Imperial Examinations from Tang Dynasty to Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 從唐代至元代科場中存在錯綜複雜的經術與文學之爭。

sentences.english: The cave by artificial chiseled into, for the Yuan Dynasty chisel.

sentences.english: Jingdezhen Yuan Dynasty greenish white porcelain was a heritage and development from the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 元代景德鎮青白瓷是對宋代的繼承和發展。

sentences.english: Wang Han was a poet of Hexi, Qiang Minority in Yuan Dynasty.

definition: Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), founded by the Jurchen 女真[Nu:3 zhen1] people of North China, a precursor of the Mongol Yuan Dynasty
the early Ming (i.e. from second half of 14th century)
late Yuan and early Ming/mid 14th century
late Ming/first half of the 17th century
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
late Ming and early Qing/around the middle of the 17th century
